knimeNode.name: SOM Clustering
knimeNode.shortDescription: Clusters the supplied data matrix using the SOM clustering module builtin to GenePattern.

fullDescription.intro:
Clusters the supplied data matrix using the SOM clustering module builtin to GenePattern.
WARNING: by using this node you are making your dataset available to the Internet, and trusting that the downloaded SOM viewing software does no harm to your computer. You should only use approved GenePattern servers as your organisation. You should only download from servers you trust!
fullDescription.option: Username (or email address) for authentication. May be blank
Password to authenticate to the server.

ports.inPort: Numeric matrix to cluster (non-numeric data columns ignored)

views.view: Output files computed by SOM module
Visual representation of SOM clustering as provided by GenePattern
